full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=================================

**Title:** Thales Luna Products or Equivalent
--------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025215:T
**Publication Date:** January 18, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2024, 16:00 (EST)

**Government Agency:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)
**Contact:** Song Prak (song.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
**Phone:** 343-550-5592
**Fax:** 613-355-7651

**Description:**
The Government of Canada invites bids for the procurement of High Security Module (HSM) Luna Hardware specifically designed for the establishment of a Disaster Recovery/failover system to the existing Primary Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Services Infrastructure.

**Objectives:**
The procurement aims to acquire equipment that meets the compatibility, interoperability, and interchangeability requirements with the current system design. The selection of Thales Luna products or equivalent ensures that the chosen solution meets the existing service requirements of the Department of National Defence (DND)/Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).

**Scope of Work:**

* Procurement of HSM Luna Hardware
* Installation and integration with the existing Primary PKI Services Infrastructure
* Testing and certification for disaster recovery and failover capabilities

**Product Classification:**

* Computers, Digital Systems, Large Scale (May Include Operating System Software) - Maintenance
* ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices - Maintenance
* Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

**Recommended bids:**

To respond to this solicitation, interested bidders should obtain the tender documents from the [link to SSC eProcurement system](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/114E224A-7014-411B-AFF2-F1F
